DOC.brief_summary: The overall hypothesis : 1 ) indirect airway challenge procedure use mannitol safely characterize asthma phenotype , predict asthma control exacerbation , predict response intervention , perform specifically direct methacholine challenge ; 2 ) PX27 pore function whole blood correlate measure airway hyperresponsiveness induced methacholine and/or mannitol challenge
DOC.criteria: subject randomize BASALT protocol positive urine pregnancy test requirement two albuterol treatment reversal methacholine bronchoprovocation challenge procedure visit 4 BASALT parent trial
